converters

This module contains various general conversion functions used throughout SMufoLib.

convertMeasurement(value, convertTo, unitsPerEm, rounded=False)[source]

Converts between units of measurement based on UPM size.

Parameters:

  • value (int | float | str) – The value to convert.

  • convertTo (str) – Unit to convert to.

  • unitsPerEm (int | float) – The UPM value to base conversion on.

  • rounded (bool) – Whether to round result to nearest integer.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError – unless convertTo='spaces' or ='units'.

Return type:

int | float | None

toDecimal(value)[source]

Converts formatted unicode or uni name to decimal codepoint.

Function accepts any hexadecimal string within the Unicode range (U+0000 – U+10FFFF) prefixed by 'u', 'U+' or 'uni'.

Parameters:

value (str) – The value to convert.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

  • ValueError – if value is not a valid formatted unicode codepoint.

Return type:

int

toKebab(string)[source]

Simple camelCase to kebab-case converter.

Parameters:

string – The string to convert.

toNumber(string)[source]

Converts numeric string to number.

Parameters:

  • value – The value to convert.

  • string (str)

Raises:

ValueError – if string is not a valid int or float.

Return type:

int | float

toUniHex(value)[source]

Converts decimal codepoint to formatted Unicode hex.

Parameters:

value (int) – The decimal to convert.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

  • ValueError – if value is outside the Unicode range (U+0000 – U+10FFFF).

Return type:

str

toUniName(value, short=False)[source]

Converts formatted Unicode hex or decimal to ‘uni’ name.

Function accepts any integer or prefixed hexadecimal string within the Unicode range(U+0000 – U+10FFFF).

Parameters:

  • value (str | int) – The value to convert.

  • short (bool) – Whether to return name with single 'u' prefix.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError – if value is outside the Unicode range (U+0000 – U+10FFFF) or not a valid formatted string.

Return type:

str

normalizers

This module is an extension of fontParts.base.normalizers and contains all normalization functionality used throughout SMufoLib.

normalizeClasses(value)[source]

Normalizes smufl classes.

Parameters:

value (tuple[str, ...] | list[str] | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError –

    • if any value item does not normalize. with normalizeSmuflName().

    • if any value item is None.

    • if any value items are duplicates.

Return type:

tuple[str] | None

normalizeDescription(value)[source]

Normalizes smufl descriptions.

Parameters:

value (str | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError – if value is an empty string.

Return type:

str | None

normalizeDesignSize(value)[source]

Normalizes design size.

Parameters:

value (int | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError – if value is less than 10.

Return type:

int | None

normalizeEngravingDefaults(value)[source]

Normalize EngravingDefaults object.

Parameters:

value (EngravingDefaults) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

Return type:

EngravingDefaults

normalizeEngravingDefaultsAttr(name, value)[source]

Normalizes engraving defaults attribute value based on name.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the attribute to normalize.

  • value (int | float | tuple[str, ...] | list[str] | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if name or value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError – if name='textFontFamily' and value contains an empty string.

Return type:

int | float | tuple[str, …] | None

normalizeFont(value)[source]

Normalizes Font object.

Parameters:

value (Font) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

Return type:

Font

normalizeRequest(value)[source]

Normalizes Request object.

Parameters:

value (Request) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

Return type:

Request

normalizeRequestPath(value)[source]

Normalizes Request path.

Relative paths are resolved automatically.

Parameters:

value (str | Path | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

Return type:

str | None

normalizeSizeRange(value)[source]

Normalizes design size.

Parameters:

value (tuple[int, int] | list[int] | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError –

    • if value does not contain a value pair.

    • if value is not an increasing range.

    • if value items do not normalize with normalizeDesignSize(), except not be None.

Return type:

tuple[int, int] | None

normalizeSmufl(value)[source]

Normalizes Smufl object.

Parameters:

value (Smufl) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

TypeError – if value is not the accepted type.

Return type:

Smufl

normalizeSmuflName(value)[source]

Normalizes smufl names.

Parameters:

value (str | None) – The value to normalize.

Raises:

  • TypeError – if value is not an accepted type.

  • ValueError –

    • if value is an empty string.

    • if value is value contains non-alphanumeric characters.

    • if value does not start with a lowercase letter or number.

Return type:

str | None

pointUtils

This module contains utility functions to simplify the syntax of fontParts.base.Point.

class Point(type, position, contourIndex)[source]

Returns named tuple for point values.

Parameters:

  • type (str)

  • position (Position)

  • contourIndex (int)

contourIndex: int

Alias for field number 2

position: Position

Alias for field number 1

type: str

Alias for field number 0

class Position(x, y)[source]

Returns named tuple for position values.

Parameters:

  • x (int | float)

  • y (int | float)

x: int | float

Alias for field number 0

y: int | float

Alias for field number 1

getCompositePoints(component, types)[source]

Gets points and offset position from glyph component.

Parameters:

  • component (RComponent)

  • types (str | tuple[str])

Return type:

tuple[str, tuple[int], int]

getContourPoints(contour, types)[source]

Returns tuple of points for all glyph contours.

Parameters:

  • contour (RContour)

  • types (str | tuple[str])

Return type:

tuple[NamedTuple]

getPoints(glyph, types=('line', 'curve', 'qcurve'))[source]

Returns tuple of points for a glyph.

Parameters:

  • glyph (Glyph)

  • types (str | tuple[str])

Return type:

tuple[NamedTuple]

stdUtils

This module contains various standard utility functions used throughout SMufoLib.

addTuples(*tuples)[source]

Sumizes tuple values.

Return type:

tuple[int | float]

flatten(iterable, depth=None)[source]

Flattens irregularly nested iterables of any depth.

Parameters:

  • iterable (Iterable[Any])

  • depth (int | None)

Return type:

Iterable[Any]

isFloat(string)[source]

Checks if string is float.

Parameters:

string (str)

Return type:

bool

validateClassAttr(obj, attributes=None)[source]

Checks for class and attribute exsistence.

Vvalidates object based on its existence and specified attributes.

Parameters:

  • obj – Object to validate

  • attributes (Iterable | None) – Attribute names to check.

Return type:

bool
